name: Hacking For Beginners
des: This is how this course will guide to into your first hack in two hours!You want to learn hacking but you don't know where to start? Then this is the course for you. Hacking for beginners course requires zero experience, zero programming knowledge and zero Linux knowledge. We start with the assumption that you know nothing about hacking, networks or the web. And step by step we will build up your knowledge so you can perform you first hack in two hours!
